boat.full_description: Built for and fished by 'Custard' Cooper for 30 years, then by George Hewitt boatbuilder, his brother David restored her in 2001. She now has an 8' bowsprit instead of her dipping lug. She's an open boat with a cuddy in the bows and sailed from Norfolk to Holland and back,160 miles door to door, in 2006. Skipper Graeme Peart notes he fitted a radar as a precaution but felt it wasn't a bad passage for an open boat.
boat.name: Harvester
boat.short_description: 'Harvester' is a North Norfolk Whelker, built by Emery of Sheringham in 1951, and restored by David Hewitt of Blakeney in 2001.
